Pre-Game Insights: India started their World Cup 2023 campaign with a victory over Australia.
India's bowlers performed exceptionally to dismiss Australia for 199.
KL Rahul and Virat Kohli had a 165-run partnership to secure the win for India.
India will be without key opener Shubman Gill due to dengue.
Afghanistan hopes to bounce back after a defeat to Bangladesh.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz was the only notable performer for Afghanistan with a score of 47.
Azmatullah Omarzai had a decent bowling performance against Bangladesh.
India is expected to field an unchanged XI from their match against Australia.
Afghanistan needs their batters to perform as a unit and their bowlers to continue their good work.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Arun Jaitley Stadium has been a strong venue for India, winning six out of the last seven ODIs played there.
The average first innings score at the Arun Jaitley Stadium is 230, while the average second innings score is 207.
Head-to-head record: India has won 2 matches, Afghanistan 0, and 1 match was tied.
World Cup face-offs: India has won 1 match, Afghanistan 0.
